before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"240hl","text":"The in vivo voltammetry was performed in wild-type mice (C57BL/6J, 21-40 days).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1s8u8","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9v7s","text":"The in vivo fiber photometry was performed in two different animal backgrounds:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36boh","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b34k1","text":"(A) For measuring calcium dynamics, we use heterozygous DAT-Cre:Ai95D (4-7 weeks) mice that were bred from homozygous DAT-Cre mice (B6.SJL-Slc6a3tm1.1(cre)Bkmn/J, JAX stock number 006660) crossed with homozygous Ai95D mice (B6;129S-Gt(ROSA)26Sortm95.1(CAG-GCaMP6f)Hze/J, JAX stock number 028865). These mice express the genetically encoded calcium indicator GCaMP6f in striatal dopaminergic axons. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ml7s","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3c78","text":"(B) For measuring evoked extracellular dopamine concentrations, we followed the steps described in the Protocol: Intracranial injections of viral vectors in mouse midbrain and striatum to inject the AAV serotype 5 vector containing GRAB-DA2m (AAV5-hSyn-GRABDA2m) in the dorsal striatum of wild-type mice. The titer dilution was 1E+13 vg/mL. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":103,"length":81},{"style":"sub","offset":239,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":103,"length":81}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ksbe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"01D1521CFB8D4F229F62CAB32D82CCD6","url":"http://10.17504/protocols.io.36wgqdyz3vk5/v1"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fk0oe","text":"This protocol describes how to measure extracellular dopamine concentrations and calcium dynamics in striatal dopaminergic axons in response to electrical stimulations using in vivo voltammetry and fiber photometry. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":174,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"1kmg0","text":"All procedures on animals were conducted in accordance with the Animals (Scientific Procedures) Act 1986 (United Kingdom), approved by an Animal Welfare and Ethical Review Board at the University of Oxford, under the authority of Licenses from the Home Office (UK).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"7dr6o","text":"Zhang et al. (2024) An axonal brake on striatal dopamine output by cholinergic interneurons, bioRxiv","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":71}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A9173D52DF0311EFB3520A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.02.17.580796v1"}}}}

parent_collections.title: Zhang, Y. et al (2025) - An axonal brake on striatal dopamine output  by cholinergic interneurons

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Preparing the mouse for surgery
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"epuv8","text":"Anesthetize the mouse in an induction chamber with urethane (1.4–1.9 g/kg, i.p.; Biolab), supplemented with additional urethane (0.2 g/kg) every 1-2 hr as required. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing the mouse for surgery
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aj600","text":"Infiltrate all wounds and pressure points with bupivacaine (0.5%). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing the mouse for surgery
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c14tk","text":"Upon reaching surgical anaesthesia, fix the head in a stereotaxic frame. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing the mouse for surgery
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ll32","text":"Monitor core temperature using a rectal probe and maintain it at 35-36°C using a homeothermic blanket. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing the mouse for surgery
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0735","text":"Administer mecamylamine (2 mg/kg) by intraperitoneal injection to block nAChRs in the striatum.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d5t65","text":"Remove a round piece of skull overlying the left hemisphere to target the dorsolateral striatum (DLS) (AP +1.0 mm, ML 1.6 mm, DV 2.2 mm to bregma).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"funnn","text":"Position a stimulating and recording array consisting of a 7 µm-diameter carbon fiber microelectrodes (CFMs; tip length 50-100 µm) and a bipolar stimulating electrode (MS303/3-A/SPC, P1 Technology) in the DLS. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3a5ji","text":"Implant the Ag/AgCl reference electrode in another part of the forebrain. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cttt5","text":"Use fast-scan cycling voltammetry (FCV) with carbon fiber microelectrodes and a Tarheel system (University of Washington, Seattle, US) to measure evoked extracellular dopamine concentration.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6dje1","text":"Apply voltage as a triangular waveform (-0.4 to +1.3 V range versus Ag/AgCl) at a scan rate of 400 V/s.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fo9hp","text":"Apply electrical stimulus (0.65 mA current, 200 µs) using a bipolar stimulating electrode (0.005 inch, MS303/3-A/SPC, P1 Technologies).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46dol","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8p9e6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1mu9","text":"Separate the stimulating electrode tips by ~500 µm and glued them to the FCV recording electrode to fix the tip of the FCV electrode between the two stimulating poles. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"919oc","text":"Remove a round piece of skull overlying the left hemisphere to target the dorsolateral striatum (DLS) (AP +1.0 mm, ML 1.6 mm, DV -2.2 mm to bregma) and susbtantia nigra (SNc) (AP -3.1mm, ML 0.8mm, DV -4.3mm to bregma). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2p21q","text":"Position the injection and recording array, consisting of a glass pipette and a 200 µm diameter fibre, in the DLS. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4e07p","text":"Apply electrical stimulus (0.5 mA current, 500 µs) using a bipolar stimulating electrode (0.005 inch, MS303/3-A/SPC, P1 Technologies) at 0.1 Hz. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vh5n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bu4ag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"29i12","text":"Separate the electrode tips by ~500 µm. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Verification of carbon-fibre locations in dorsal striatum
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1rdui","text":"Sacrifice anesthetised mice and quickly remove brains.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Verification of carbon-fibre locations in dorsal striatum
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aec2","text":"Fix whole brains overnight in 4% PFA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Verification of carbon-fibre locations in dorsal striatum
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"95jvr","text":"Section fixed brains into 50 μm slices using a vibratome.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Verification of carbon-fibre locations in dorsal striatum
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"72u21","text":"Mount the individual slices on glass slides and image under microscope to identify the location of recording sites. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6f3gd","text":"Sample data at 10 Hz. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9k974","text":"Surgical Procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fast-scan cyclic voltammetry (FCV)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4inut","text":"Determining evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using electrical stimulations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":91}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6qnhu","text":"Surgical Procedure:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ao81s","text":"These steps were performed in heterozygous DAT-Cre:Ai95D (4-7 weeks) mice expressing the genetically encoded calcium indicator GCaMP6f in striatal dopaminergic axons, or in wild-type mice expressing GRABDA2m in the dorsal striatum. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":203,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8goqu","text":"Determining axonal calcium dynamics in striatal dopaminergic (DA) axons using electrical stimulations:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":102}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1iv59","text":"Activate GCaMP6f expression in DA axons with 480 nm light (76 µW).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"acnf4","text":"Sample the intensity of GCaMP6f at 40 Hz with Neurophotometrics (FP3001). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmk4l","text":"Determining evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using electrical stimulations:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":91}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddt4s","text":"These steps were performed in wild-type mice expressing GRABDA2m in the dorsal striatum. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":60,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1gt8m","text":"Activate GRAB-DA2m with 480 nm light (76 µW).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":16,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3kg1b","text":"Sample the intensity of GRAB-DA2m at 40 Hz with Neurophotometrics (FP3001). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":31,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring axonal calcium dynamics and evoked extracellular dopamine (DA) concentration using fiber photometry
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ekmcb","text":"Apply electrical stimulus (0.5 mA current, 500 µs) using a bipolar stimulating electrode (0.005 inch, MS303/3-A/SPC, P1 Technologies) at 0.05 Hz. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: In vivo voltammetry and fiber photometry in the mouse striatum
